Heil Cockinamouthmaster!

Please, help me get things right. 

1. The real holocaust was the firebombing i Hamburg?
2. You tell me that Hitler was a nice person?
3. You tell me that Auswitch was not a war crime?
4. You tell me that that jews are pedofile rapists?
As a filesharer i am ashamed being on the same ship as you and the stinking nazi leechers who help you spread the hate and lies you share. The picture of Spielberg show very well who you really are.

To "bigmac the ripper"

I never said Hitler was nice, you lied. I never said that no war-crimes were committed at Auschwitz, you lied. I never said that all Jews are pedophile rapists, you lied. 

A firebombing with thousands of planes, as we did to Dresden, and Hamburg, or nuclear bombings, as we did to Hiroshima, and Nagasaki, are the dictionary definitions of holocaust.

 Steven Spielberg, and most of his ilk, are war-propagandists who, working hand-in-hand with the Pentagon (5+6) since ww2, perpetuate the six-million/gas-chambers lie, in order to render irrelevant the 60 million people who died in ww2, in the eyes of all the media-believing suckers like you, and also to excuse the formation of the zionist state of israel, smack on top of Palestine, whose inhabitants were, and are, the direct descendants of Semitic peoples, including Jews. I am ashamed of how selfish and stupid humanity can be.

 Walk the plank, just don't break it on the way, because there's plenty of other culturally biased liars with Jewish mothers who need some water splashed in their faces too.
